name: .INLX File Extension
summary: Learn about .INLX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An INLX file is an object library exported by Adobe InDesign, an application used to create professional page layouts. It contain graphics, text, and pages, as well as ruler guides, grids, drawn shapes, and grouped images. INLX files are similar to .INDL files but are saved in XML format.

content: InDesign is a desktop publishing program used to create professional layouts for print and digital publishing. The program includes a multitude of layout features to assist you in creating brochures, magazines, posters, and more.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
